name: diun
description: Diun (Docker Image Update Notifier) is a CLI and webhook-based tool that notifies you when Docker images are updated. It's ideal for automated maintenance and integrates well with CI/CD pipelines.
features: Update Notifications: Get alerted when Docker images are updated. Stay informed automatically.
Multi-Platform: Monitor images from Docker Hub, GHCR, and private registries. Universal coverage.
Webhook Integration: Trigger actions when updates are detected. Automated workflows.
CI/CD Ready: Perfect for automated maintenance pipelines. DevOps-friendly tool.
Flexible Notifications: Send alerts via email, Slack, Discord, and more. Choose your channel.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage for efficient monitoring. Run anywhere Docker runs.
